Resources for Whanãu

Websites

Family Planning

Check out this website for information and resources for parents and caregivers.

Kinsey

An interesting read on abstinence within sexuality education.

Kiwi Families

Articles to read and a forum that includes discussion around sexuality education.

Ministry of Health

Access point to a large number of resources and information on sexual and reproductive health.

Pflag

Group of parents, family and friends of gay, lesbian, bisexual, intersexual and transgender people.

Rainbow Youth

Auckland based organisation providing support, information, advocacy & education for queer young people & their families.

Sparx

Online e-therapy tool helping young people learn skills to deal with feeling down, depressed or stressed.

TESTICULAR CANCER NZ

Educating people about male specific cancers, in particular testicular and prostate cancers.

Unesco

Quick read of interesting background to International Guidelines on Sexual Education
